title: Quarkus 2.4.1.Final released - Maintenance release
content: We just released Quarkus 2.4.1.Final, a maintenance release for our 2.4 release train containing bugfixes and documentation improvements. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.4. If you are not using 2.4 already, please refer to the 2.4 migration guide. Full changelog You can get the full changelog...
